16:04 <DarkKnightCZ> does anybody know where XWikiSecretVerifier is being called? (the verify method)  
16:34 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
16:41 <Enygma`> DarkKnightCZ: On a quick search, I find org.restlet.security.SecretVerifier.verify() which is called by org.restlet.security.ChallengeAuthenticator.authenticate() which ends up being called by org.xwiki.rest.internal.XWikiAuthentication.authenticate()  
16:43 <Enygma`> DarkKnightCZ: http://hastebin.com/kulusemona.avrasm  
16:43 <DarkKnightCZ> Enygma`: nice, thanks
